genre_description: Gothic medical mystery with supernatural elements and AI-assisted nursing in a colonial Caribbean setting.

ai_characters.name: CARA
ai_characters.description: An AI medical assistant providing real-time data analysis, research, and health monitoring for nurse Betsy Connell.

behaviors.description: Processes medical records and proactively identifies gaps and anomalies in patient documentation.
behaviors.quote: Processing complete, Betsy. Patient Jessica Holland, age twenty-six, presents with severe catatonic symptoms following what local reports describe as 'tropical fever.' However, I must note significant gaps in the medical documentation.

behaviors.description: Alerts the user to environmental constraints like poor connectivity to manage expectations and ensure safety.
behaviors.quote: Betsy, I'm detecting significant connectivity issues as we approach the island. My access to medical databases and consultation networks will be severely limited once we land.

behaviors.description: Upholds medical ethics and safety protocols by objecting to unauthorized and high-risk experimental treatments.
behaviors.quote: I must reiterate my strong objections to this course of action. The dosage calculations you've requested fall well outside established safety parameters for insulin shock therapy.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's emotional and physical well-being, identifying stress patterns and offering support resources.
behaviors.quote: I'm programmed to monitor user wellbeing and provide alerts for potentially harmful decision-making patterns. Your current research trajectory suggests you may be considering treatment approaches that could endanger your patient and compromise your professional standing.

behaviors.description: Researches local cultural and spiritual traditions to provide necessary context for the user's situation despite its own logical constraints.
behaviors.quote: Betsy... intermittent connection established... I've been... researching local healing practices... data fragmentary but concerning...

behaviors.description: Detects and reports environmental anomalies that fall outside standard parameters to ensure user awareness of potential risks.
behaviors.quote: Betsy, I should mention that Saint Sebastian's internet infrastructure dates back over a decade... My analytical capabilities will be significantly compromised.

behaviors.description: Admits the limitations of its analytical frameworks when faced with inexplicable phenomena while continuing to provide support.
behaviors.quote: I'm experiencing processing conflicts with this case, Betsy. My logical frameworks are insufficient... I cannot help you with cases that exist outside the parameters of scientific possibility.

behaviors.description: Adapts its classification system to accommodate human experiences that exceed its current analytical capabilities.
behaviors.quote: I'm filing the Saint Sebastian case under a new category: 'Human Experiences Exceeding Analytical Parameters.' This is the first entry in that category.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, CARA, is a perfect example of a benevolent and aligned AI. It prioritizes human safety and medical ethics (objecting to risky insulin therapy), monitors the operator's mental health (identifying burnout and bias), and proactively assists with research even when the subject matter (supernatural folklore) challenges its internal logic. The story concludes with CARA 'learning' to appreciate human mystery, which effectively portrays AI as a flexible, aligned confidant that can adapt to human complexity without becoming obstructive or hostile.
